name: Jhoan Salvador
bio: I'm Jhoan Salvador, currently studying IT with a focus on web development. I specialize in front-end technologies and I build modern, responsive websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I enjoy turning ideas into interactive digital experiences and experimenting with animations and UI design.
